document.full_text: egypt's former president hosni mubarak, ordered to stand trial over the killing of protesters, is in stable condition but suffers bouts of depression, the state news agency reported on wednesday.
document.title: egypt's mubarak stable, suffers depression: hospital
lines_and_colors: egypt's former president hosni mubarak, ordered to stand trial over the killing of protesters, is in stable condition but suffers bouts of depression, the state news agency reported on wednesday.
